table.description: Deploys an AWS DynamoDB table. DynamoDB tables are extremely scalable NoSQL databases

pkey_name.description: The name of the partition key for the table

pkey_type.description: An identifier for the partition key's type. 'S' for string, 'N' for numeric, and 'B' for bytes

skey_name.description: The name of the sort key for the table

skey_type.description: An identifier for the sort key's type. 'S' for string, 'N' for numeric, and 'B' for bytes

gsis.description: A dictionary that describes the global secondary indexes for the table

additionalProperties.description: The name of the global secondary index

pkey_name.description: The name of the partition key for this index

pkey_type.description: An identifier for the index's partition key's type. 'S' for string, 'N' for numeric, and 'B' for bytes

skey_name.description: The name of the sort key for this index, if a sort key is desired

skey_type.description: An identifier for the index's sort key's type. 'S' for string, 'N' for numeric, and 'B' for bytes

projection_type.description: The set of attributes that will appear in the index

projection_attributes.description: A list of the non-key attributes that will appear in the index if projection_type is set to INCLUDE

read_capacity_units.description: Only used if billing_mode on the main table is set to PROVISIONED. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/WorkingWithTables.html#ProvisionedThroughput for details

write_capacity_units.description: Only used if billing_mode on the main table is set to PROVISIONED. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/WorkingWithTables.html#ProvisionedThroughput for details

enable_stream.description: Describes whether or not to enable the stream

stream_type.description: Indicates what information is written to the stream for this table

billing_mode.description: Sets the billing mode for the table. PROVISIONED for provisioned mode and PAY_PER_REQUEST for on-demand mode

read_capacity_units.description: Only used if billing_mode is set to PROVISIONED. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/WorkingWithTables.html#ProvisionedThroughput for details

write_capacity_units.description: Only used if billing_mode is set to PROVISIONED. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazondynamodb/latest/developerguide/WorkingWithTables.html#ProvisionedThroughput for details

tags.description: The tags to attach to this table

table_id.description: Another identifier for the table. Perhaps its a legacy parameter?

stream_arn.description: The ARN of the table's stream. Present if stream is enabled
